sections.TOP: Wendwater013391osv2qenw3icwd92l7myqges3vvbs3fi1199212014-03-28T12:08:12ZGreater good3347453/* See also */The '''Wendwater''' River flows from the northeast of [[the Stormlands]] through the [[Kingswood]] and [[the Crownlands]] to empty into the south of [[Blackwater Bay]].<ref>[[Complete Guide to Westeros]]:  Robert's Rebellion - Stannis Baratheon</ref>
